content.rendered:
Slightly Stoopid x Humboldt Seed Company

It’s a match made in mellow, musical, high-grade heaven. Whether you’re chasing waves or blazing stages, Collie Man Kush and Stoopid Fruits deliver sweet Sensi vibes straight from the band to your grow.

Slightly Stoopid x Humboldt Seed Company

It’s a match made in mellow, musical, high-grade heaven. Whether you’re chasing waves or blazing stages, Collie Man Kush and Stoopid Fruits deliver sweet Sensi vibes straight from the band to your grow.

60 DAYS

Slightly Stoopid Collie Man Kush Cannabis Seeds

Feminized Seeds, Original Strain

Collie Man Kush was crafted in collaboration with Slightly Stoopid to bring the heat both in sound and in smoke. This potent OG-inspired strain hits hard with gassy, fuel-forward terps and a sparkle that rivals the Ocean Beach surf. Built for chill sessions that last ‘til 2am, it’s the kind of herb that makes you pause, pass, and appreciate.

Cannabis Strain Benefits

  • Available: Feminized
  • Parentals: Humboldt Reserve OG x All Gas OG
  • Ind / Sat: Indica (90% Indica 10% Sativa)
  • Photoperiodic Flowering: 60 Days, Oct.1st-15th
  • Flavor / Taste / Smell: OG Fuel, Venom OG
  • Effect: Potency of Kush, Non-Drowsy
  • %THC: 22-26%
  • Characteristics: Dense & Productive, Full of Trichomes

Our seeds are available for sale in the US in our shop californiahempseeds.com and in the EU at humboldtseedcompany.es (please note you will be redirected clicking a link below).  

Shop US
SHOP EU

65 DAYS

Slightly Stoopid – Stoopid Fruits Cannabis Seeds

Feminized Seeds, Original Strain

Stoopid Fruits is a love letter to the beachside vibes and sweet Sensi energy of Slightly Stoopid. Inspired by frontman Kyle McDonald’s love for sweet sensi, we set out to dial in a strain that hits like a perfect set at sunset. Bursting with big nugs and feel-good energy, this fruity powerhouse grows loud and proud, just like the band. Crank the volume and get ready to ride the mellow wave.

Cannabis Strain Benefits

  • Available: Feminized
  • Available: Reg, Fem
  • Parentals: Apricot Papaya x Strawberry DQ
  • Ind / Sat: Sativa (20% Indica 80% Sativa)
  • Photoperiodic Flowering: 65 Days, Oct.30th-Nov.5th
  • Flavor / Taste / Smell: Papaya, Strawberry, Mango
  • Effect: Fun, Uplifting
  • %THC: 21%
  • Characteristics: Huge Nugs

Our seeds are available for sale in the US in our shop californiahempseeds.com and in the EU at humboldtseedcompany.es (please note you will be redirected clicking a link below).  

Shop US
SHOP EU

Customer reviews

Stoopid Fruits – Loved the name, decided to try, enjoy the high! Love how fast it kicks in, very Eye drooping, happy good feels, But still feeling extra creative, most definitely getting more!

5 / 5

Stoopid Fruits – Sweet fruity aroma. Strong apricot after taste after a smoke. Very heady sativa high. Only the after effects are like indica post peak. Enjoyable high, doesn’t get you too wired.

5 / 5

Collie Man Kush – With an earthy taste and a hint of citrus zest, this strain is fast acting and very uplifting. Be prepared to giggle and be absolutely stress free.

5 / 5

Collie Man Kush– This strain got me feeling amazing! Considering I always have bud on deck, I can honestly say that this strain stood out.

5 / 5
